Review and run workflows configured for your organization on your models.

::: {.attn}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] The model is registered in the model inventory.[^1]
- [x] Workflows have already been set up for use with your models.[^2]
- [x] You are a assigned role with sufficient permissions to view and run workflows on models.[^3]

:::

## Review model workflows

{{< include _review-model-workflows.qmd >}}

## Run model workflows

To manually run a workflow[^4] for a specific model:

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa cubes >}} Inventory**.

2. Select a model or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.[^5]

3. On the landing page of your model, locate the [active workflows]{.smallcaps} section.

4. Click **{{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} See all workflows**.

5. Select **{{< fa arrow-right >}} Run workflow** for the workflow you'd like to initiate, then select your desired **[workflow start]{.smallcaps}** option:

    - **Run Now** — Workflow starts instantly.
    - **Scheduled Run** — Set a future date to run the workflow.

6. Click **{{< fa arrow-right >}} Run Workflow Now** to confirm.

[^1]: [Register models in the inventory](/guide/model-inventory/register-models-in-inventory.qmd)

[^2]: [Configure custom workflows](configure-custom-workflows.qmd)

[^4]:

    ::: {.callout title="Workflows can be set to run automatically on specific triggers."}
    Refer to [Configure custom workflows](configure-custom-workflows.qmd) for more details.
    :::
